Text: The Best of Van Morrison Volume 3 is a compilation album by Northern Irish singer-songwriter Van Morrison, that was released on 11 June 2007 in the UK with a digital version released in the U.S. on iTunes Store, on 12 June 2007.

Text: The Best of Van Morrison Volume 3:  It offers an overview of his large volume of material since the release of "The Best of Van Morrison Volume Two" in 1993.

The Best of Van Morrison Volume 3

--------------------
Text: The Best of Van Morrison Volume 3:  The album's thirty-one tracks include previously unreleased collaborations with Tom Jones ("Cry For Home") and Bobby Bland ("Tupelo Honey") as well as duets with John Lee Hooker, B.B. King and Ray Charles.
